channel.title: [Suggestion]IRC Server
channel.description:
If possible mitb, could you set up a IRC Server on your own hosting. I don't know about any other IRC Users, but I seem to have terrible DNS Issues. It takes often 15+ attempts to connect, and so far today I have not been able to at all.
It would be a plus for you because you could assign your own staff etc.

item.title: [Suggestion]IRC Server
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“ThugLife, post:46, topic:182229”][quote author=Swordskid61 link=topic=243867.msg2077713#msg2077713 date=1204219184]
^ Ye i like to screw with the people @ #deltaanime sometimes.
[/quote]
So basically you want us to get kicked off yet another server? because back on freenode we used to go trolling channels like ##windows, constantly fuck around in the channel with the ‘DCC SEND exploit’ that of course attracted staff. Staff used to come in tell us what we could and could not do, anything quux (one of the freenode staff) did not like he would get straight up our asses and not shut up till we gave in. DeltaAnime is a much more relaxed server so the way we act is not as noticable although we do have a reputation on there too.

If you troll in #deltaanime the opers in there whois you to find out you are yet another #mopar user, giving us a worse reputation and more chance of being kicked off that server too.

Edit: is it just me or has deltaanime gone down?[/quote]
Yeah. +1, although I may have fall-outs with Thug-life at times.

Swordskid61:

^ Ye i like to screw with the people @ #deltaanime sometimes.

I did not mean it like that. I meant being at deltaanime is good, because it gives us a chance to meet new people, other then people who use #mopar. I mean, if we’re on our server, I would of never found the people in #wolf. I would never know as much as IRC as I do now, I would never have an Oper who gave me permission to ban evade when I was testing the filter on my IRC Bot.

Read full topic

item.title: [Suggestion]IRC Server
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

[quote=“ThugLife, post:2, topic:182229”]We have asked him to do this many times and everytime he has said no. His reason? Because he says he would rather be on a large network that has plenty of servers because if he hosts his own server and that goes down while he is away then what can we do? we have no irc then do we?

I suppose if a few of us bought some shell accounts off kib or someone we could all set one up and link them alltogether so we then know if one goes down we’ll be alright :)[/quote]

oh, i though u meant shells to threaten mopar and be like “ill blow your brains out”

Read full topic

item.title: [Suggestion]IRC Server
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

I’ve said this before, but I will say it again for sake of repetitiveness, I am always willing to provide an ircd if mopar desires. If he does not want me to be solely in control of whether the channel is available or not (perfectly understandable :P) or like he said before wants redundancy, how about me and one on the dedi/someone else, and link them?

Just an idea.
